title: WATCH: Rebecca Malope unpacks the rumors that this will be her last album and more
text:
WATCH: Rebecca Malope unpacks the rumors that this will be her last album and more

Cape Town - A few months ago rumours were rampant that gospel legend, Rebecca Malope's upcoming album would be her last. The incredibly talented singer confirmed the news to Move! Magazine saying: "I think that I have done a lot and the years have gone. My 36th album is so beautiful, and I have collaborated with my kids such as Dumi Mkokstad, Lebo Sekgobela, Amadonana AseWesile, Soweto Gospel Choir and many more. I wanted to say goodbye on a high note."

Now, Rebecca has taken time out her busy schedule - which includes TV, recording music and inspiring millions through song - to address the rumours, discuss what she's learnt after decades in the industry and so much more.

CHECK OUT CHANNEL24'S INTERVIEW WITH REBECCA MALOPE HERE:
description: Will this be her last album? What up and coming artists is she listening to? The gospel legend gave Channel24 the inside scoop.
